message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start the negotiation at $800000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your confidence in its value. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $750000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I believe the product's value is higher than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $825000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's worth to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter your offer with $780000.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $850000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you the product for $825000. This is my final offer, and I hope you can meet me in the middle.
I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. Considering your last offer, I would like to counter with $800000.

I'm not willing to go below $825000, Bob. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to you. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you the product for $820000. This is my final offer, and I hope you can meet me in the middle.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. Considering your last offer, I would like to counter with $810000.

I'm not willing to go below $820000, Bob. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $815000. This is my final offer, and I hope you can meet me in the middle.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering your last offer, I would like to counter with $812500.
